# Dan Snow

> Personal website of Dan Snow, a researcher and data scientist.
> Contains blog posts about data science, healthcare, local government,
> and technology, as well as book reviews, photos, and talk slides.

## Sections

- [Writing](https://sno.ws/): Posts about data and technology
- [Reading](https://sno.ws/reading/): Book reviews and reading log
- [Photos](https://sno.ws/photos/): Photo gallery
- [Talks](https://sno.ws/talks/): Conference and meetup talk slides
- [About](https://sno.ws/about/): Background and bio

## Additional Resources

- [RSS Feed](https://sno.ws/index.xml)
- [Sitemap](https://sno.ws/sitemap.xml)
